headline: How To Earn $500 A Month From Visa Stock Ahead Of Q1 Earnings
summary: Visa Inc. (NYSE:V) will release earnings for its first quarter after the closing bell on Thursday, Jan. 29. Analysts expect the company to report quarterly earnings of $3.14 per share. That’s up from $2.75 per share in the year-ago period. The consensus estimate for Visa's quarterly revenue is $10.69 billion (it reported $9.51 billion last year), according to Benzinga Pro. With the recent buzz around Visa, some investors may be eyeing potential gains from the company's dividends too. As of now,
